Body:
A3 = r[3]
A4 = r[4]
ss = np.sign(A4)
stt = np.abs(A4)
Ei = r[7]
Ef = r[8]
ki = np.sqrt(Ei) * factorsqrtEK
kf = np.sqrt(Ef) * factorsqrtEK
sgu = r[5]
sgl = r[6]
theta = calcTheta(ki, kf, stt)
try:
    om = A3 - ss * theta
except:
    om = A3.reshape(-1, 1, 1) - ss * theta
return uFromAngles(om, sgu, sgl)
